doc.title: Safakta bulusalim
doc.plot: Halil kills two men and attempts to kill the third, yet Semih escapes and provide Halil to be arrested. Halil is put into prison. Semih goes on with his corrupt business and the only thing he really cares about is his daughter Gulben. Gulben is aware of Sher father Semih's dirty business. Halil is released from prison and he wants to take revenge from Semih so he kidnaps Gulben. While being held by Halil, Gulben injures him, yet regrets it after wards and takes care of him. Halil tells her the truth about her father's business. Gulben begs him not to kill her father. They meet and Semih wants to shoot Halil yet Gulben interferes and tells him that she is ashamed of a father like he is. Semih commits suicide. Halil is in prison for a few years and after completing his time, he and Gulben will reunite.
